FuncDef: This command configures the speed of a SONET/SDH port as either OC3 or OC12. The framer for this MDA operates in groups of four. Changing the port speed for a port requires resetting the framer and causes a slight disruption on all four ports. The first framer controls ports 1,2,3,4, the second framer controls ports 5,6,7,8 and so on.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the speed of the port to OC-3.
Sets the speed of the port to OC-12.
